data.message: I want to Tag to a person , but i cant :-( , please say to me , how I want to tag a person in a photo to page ?

replies.message: Hey there. You can tag your friend in a photo by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2eDjGX6. -Jessica

Dear Sir: I would very much appreciate it if you could kindly resolve the problem that I am facing with FB for already 7 month: My FB photos part shows my various albums where I had saved many photos before, however since March 2016 when I open the albums I cannot see those photos. Therefore, I am asking you to fix the mentioned problem, since I really need those photos which, unfortunately, I didn’t save in other places. Looking forward to your prompt response, Sona Martirosyan

Facebook  here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.

Facebook  still waiting fo an answer about how to stay in touch with people when you take away the mobile site. as i mentioned, i have a company owned phone, which means i am not allowed to install external apps on it. which means you are taking away my only way to message on facebook.
